ProductInfo.Features:
GW3008HD: Professional 8 Channel H.264 960H/FD1 DVR with HDMI & VGA. FD1/CIF/960H/Q960H recording, 8ch 960H Full Channels Real-time Playback . iPhone, Android Viewing, PTZ Control
GW790WD: 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 70 ft. IR Distance. Low Illumination Color: 0.3Lux, B&W;: 0Lux. Vandal resistant & water proof
Package Includes: GW3008HD DVR with 2TB HDD; GWLED19IN - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 6 x GW790WD - 1/3" SONY CCD Camera
1 x GW125CAW: 125 feet pre-made cable BNC;1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC;3 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC;1 x 12V5A Power Supply For Security Cameras;1 x 1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 6CHE7 8 Channel H.264 960H/FD1 DVR with 6 x Water Proof 1/3 Inches SONY CCD 700 TVL 2.8~12mm Lens Security Camera System, Free LED Monitor (Black/White)
